task.title: Provide volume control
task.shortdesc: You can set up a user interface control to adjust the volume for the video.

step.cmd: In the callback routine for the volume control interface element, ensure that the player is in a valid status for this command.

info.note: Any status, except for RELEASED is valid.

step.cmd: Call setVolume to set the audio volume.

info.p: For example: void setVolume(int volume) throws MediaPlayerException;
The value for the volume represents the requested volume expressed as a proportion of the maximum volume, where 0 is silent and 1 is the maximum volume.
